announcements.title: [Events] Celebration Events are coming soon!
announcements.content:
Hope to see you there!
Please don't stress about gaming! It's just for fun!

announcements.title: [Announcement] Prize Wheel - Click here to see the new winners!

The prize wheel will be spun every week!

Check out our clowder room to see if you won!

announcements.title: [Announcement] Where to find Shroom_Room members
announcements.content:
If you found your nickname on the winners list, you can get the prizes from the clowder leader: Agent_Schweetz
You can find Agent_Schweetz easily on most times, but if you cannot find the leader,
check your timezone, Agent_Schweetz can be online after 4PM(England, UK) on weekdays.
And mostly online at any other time on weekends.

If you're finding other members like sjwon0368(Site Management), or our co-leaders,
try searching for them in our IRC network.
You can read on how to join the channel in the Chat page.

Member timezones:
Agent_Schweetz: England, UK
sjwon0368: South Korea, Asia
